name: ISBNCheckDigit_isValidTest
description: Unit tests for the isValid method of the ISBNCheckDigit class.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithNullCode
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a null code.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithValidISBN10
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a valid ISBN-10 code.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithInvalidISBN10
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with an invalid ISBN-10 code.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithValidISBN13
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a valid ISBN-13 code.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithInvalidISBN13
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with an invalid ISBN-13 code.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithInvalidLength
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with codes of invalid lengths (9, 11, 12, and 14).
